history.proof: hauto lq: on drew: off use: Nat.le_gt_cases, Nat.le_add_r, Nat.le_ge_cases, Nat.le_le_succ_r, sumToN1, cPairProjections, Nat.le_refl unfold: ge, cPairPi2, cPair, Init.Nat.add, in_int inv: le, nat.

original: intros a. unfold cPairPi1. rewrite <- Nat.le_pred_l with (n := a) at 1. apply Nat.le_decidable.
